name: The Nickname's the Same Online Trivia | College Nicknames & Mascots | 10 Questions

questions.text: All of these teams are called the Rams except one. Which one is NOT the Rams?
questions.explanation:
New Mexico State.

	New Mexico State's nickname is the Aggies

questions.text: All of these teams are called the Huskies except one. Which team is NOT called the Huskies?
questions.explanation:
Washington State.

	Washington State's nickname is the Cougars. The University of Washington's nickname is the Huskies.

questions.text: Which of the following team's nickname is NOT the Aggies?
questions.explanation:
Prairie View A and M.

	Prairie View's nickname is the Panthers.

questions.text: Which one of the teams listed does NOT have the nickname Cowboys?
questions.explanation:
Cal State Northridge.

	The teams of Cal State-Northridge are known as the Matadors.

questions.text: Which one of these college does not have the nickname 'Bulldogs?
questions.explanation:
Albany.

	Albany's nickname is the Great Danes.

questions.text: All of these teams mascot is the Wildcat except one. Which one's mascot is not the Wildcats?
questions.explanation:
South Carolina State.

	The mascot for South Carolina State is the Bulldog.

questions.text: Ready for some more Wildcats? Which one of these team's nickname is NOT the Wildcats?
questions.explanation:
Liberty.

	The Liberty teams are known as the Flames.

questions.text: All of these teams are known as Eagles, except which one?
questions.explanation:
Western Illinois.

	The Western Illinois teams are known as the Leathernecks.

questions.text: All of the following colleges are called the Bears except one. Can you guess which one isn't the Bears?
Which of these teams is not the Hornets?
questions.explanation:
Tennessee State.

	If you played for Tennessee State, you would be a Tiger.
